fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Royal Finger (Day): Your next vote will count as two, including nightfall votes.
- Decide Fate (Day, 1 use): Immediately hang a player, or grant a player hanging immunity for the day. The town will be notified if you did either.
- Guards? (Night, 1 use): Grant yourself Powerful defense against all attacks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cannot be jailed by jailor-type roles.
- Conversion immune.
- Cannot be targeted by investigative abilities, all investigative abilities used on you will fail no matter what.
- Cannot co-exist with Good King (2028), Evil King (2030), Neutral King (2031), and Psycho King (2032).
- You are revealed as the King at the beginning of the game. The town will not be notified of your alignment.
- You may choose to have a role that shows above the game's players called King, and may choose the role's color.
- 2028's City King changes also apply to you if City is in the game.
- You can only spawn by being elected as Pretender. Under all other conditions you are unable to spawn.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
